activities: FMC Corporation is a diversified specialty chemical company serving agricultural, environmental, and consumer markets globally for more than a century with innovative solutions, applications and quality products in the food, pharmaceuticals, and energy sectors. The company centralizes its human resources functions in the United States as as such, tranfers copies of personnel files to the United states for all employees and contractors who reside outside of the United States, including in the EU and Switzerland.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Interested parties who believe that their inquiries to FMC have not been satisfactorily addressed are invited to contact the American Arbitration Association (the "AAA"). The AAA will then work with FMC to resolve concerns.
